column5: was wondering if anyone knows the conditions of the grand river by dunnville and how the fishing has been?  I heard that it was flooded.?  Any help would be greatly appreciated.  Thanks,  lovetofish

Check out FISHMASTER's web site via google for all updates on conditions including fishing reports. Currently, water levels are high but NO flooding and the KITTYS are starting to be active especially thru the evenings into the nites.
with the rain we have got the grands started to go up and will be dirty
Thr lower Grand is always dirty.
http://www.grandriver.ca/index/Agreement.c...b1=6&sub2=5  There is nothing to do up to middle/end of May. Just ugly catfish may be a trophy
